articles.title: Grandma celebrates 5th Thanksgiving with man accidentally invited to dinner after losing husband to COVID-19 - USA TODAY
articles.description: Wanda Dench and Jamal Hinton have had Thanksgiving together for four years after an accidental text. This year, they celebrated without Lonnie Dench.
articles.content:
Lonnie Dench's wife famously invited a stranger to Thanksgiving dinner. A previous version of this video misspelled their last name.
USA TODAY
An Arizona grandmother and the stranger she accidental… [+3507 chars]

articles.author: Sarah Whitten
articles.title: 'The Croods: A New Age' will be a 'non-event' at the Thanksgiving box office, analysts say - CNBC
articles.description: While cinema owners are excited to have a family-friendly title in theaters, industry experts aren't convinced "The Croods" sequel is a box office savior.
articles.content:
"The Croods: A New Age," arriving in movie theaters on Thanksgiving, is a rare bright spot for operators who have been forced to show older films at discounted prices for the last few months.
While … [+3471 chars]
